bug.author: bee-san
bug.summary: Final result should be printed last
bug.description:
If it's 500 decodings, you would have to scroll all the way up to find the answer. <denchmark-code>Final result: "hello my name is bee" Format used: utf8 base64 </denchmark-code>
It should be: <denchmark-code>Format used: utf8 base64 Final result: "hello my name is bee" </denchmark-code>
